feat: Add photo upload, profile display, and modern Apple-style navigation

This comprehensive update enhances the user experience with photo management
and a modern navigation design inspired by Apple''s design language.

## Features Added:

### Photo Upload & Display
- Convert foto field from CharField to ImageField for Mahasiswa and Dosen models
- Add photo upload functionality in edit biodata pages with file validation
- Display uploaded photos in profile avatars (biodata pages)
- Display photos in dashboard profile icons for both roles
- Create printable ID cards (cetak kartu) with photo integration
- Configure media file serving in Django settings and Nginx

### Navigation Menu Improvements
- Add Biodata menu item for both Mahasiswa and Dosen
- Implement Apple-style navigation with modern icons (SVG)
- Add hover effects with subtle background transitions
- Include icons for all menu items: Dashboard, Biodata, KRS, KHS, Jadwal, Presensi, Kelas
- Style logout button with distinctive red accent
- Responsive design with horizontal scroll on mobile devices

### UI/UX Enhancements
- Improve KRS table responsiveness with horizontal scroll wrapper
- Reduce button sizes for better mobile experience
- Add CSS object-fit: cover for proper photo aspect ratios
- Implement rounded corners and backdrop filters for modern look
- Add responsive breakpoints for tablet (1024px) and mobile (768px)

### Technical Changes
- Database migration: 0004_alter_dosen_foto_alter_mahasiswa_foto.py
- Add Pillow dependency for image processing
- Configure MEDIA_URL and MEDIA_ROOT in Django settings
- Update Nginx configuration for media file serving
- Add cetak_kartu views and URLs for ID card printing
- Update base.html with enhanced navigation styling

All changes maintain backward compatibility and follow Django best practices.
